doc:
Matt Shakman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matt_Shakman 0 Matt Shakman (born August 8, 1975) is an American film, television, and theatre director, and former child actor. He is most well known for his work on It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, Fargo and Game of Thrones. He is the artistic director of the Geffen Playhouse in Los Angeles, California. Matt_Shakman ( born August_8_,_1975 ) is an_American_film , television , and theatre_director , and former_child_actor . He is most_well known for his_work on It 's Always_Sunny in Philadelphia_,_Fargo_and_Game of Thrones . He is the_artistic_director of the_Geffen_Playhouse in Los_Angeles , California .
